description:
A space adventure game with fun and challenging mineral extraction with a huge asteroid moving towards your home planet that must be destroyed before it blows up everything you know. Extract and collect as much material from asteroids as you can to upgrade your space crafts thrusters and extractor and your space stations super beam to stop the end of the world.

Gameplay

  • Fly a spaceship around your solar system collecting rare earth metals that are needed to build upgrades.
  • Dont let the Mega Asteroid destroy your planet.
  • Increase your spaceships thrusters with upgrades.
  • Three tiers of upgrades available for every upgrade.

Controls

  • Strafe- WASD
  • Counter Thrusters- Hold Spacebar
  • Yaw- Up Arrow, Down Arrow
  • Pitch- Left Arrow, Right Arrow
  • Roll- Q, E
  • Upgrades Menu- Tab
  • Pause- Escape

Credits
